flawed_nl_solution:
After his daughter eats some candy, Boris has 100 - 8 = <<100-8=92>>92 pieces of candy
In one bowl, there are 92 / 4 = <<92/4=32>>32 pieces of candy
After Boris takes some candy for himself, there are 32 - 3 = <<32-3=29>>29 pieces of candy in one bowl
#### 29

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 23, not 32. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
